field.name: CPWMS
field.description: Centre-Aligned PWM Select\n Selects between left and centre-aligned PWM pulse output

field.name: TOIE
field.description: Timer Overflow Interrupt Enable\n An interrupt is generated when TOF equals one

field.name: ELS
field.description: Edge or Level Select\n Determine edge sensitivity of IC or output action of OC and pulse polarity of PWM\n Edge sensitivity/Output polarity/Pulse polarity

field.name: MS
field.description: Channel Mode Select\n Determines Input Capture, Output Compare & Pulse Width Modulation

field.name: CHF
field.description: Channel Flag\nSet when a channel event occurs

field.name: INIT
field.description: Initial Value of the FTM Counter

field.name: INIT
field.description: Initial Value of the FTM Counter

field.name: INIT
field.description: Initial Value of the FTM Counter

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Only the TPM-compatible registers (first set of registers) can be used without any restriction. Do not use the FTM-specific

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: All registers including the FTM-specific registers (second set of registers) are available for use with no restrictions

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No restrictions. Software and hardware triggers can be used by MOD, CnV, OUTMASK, and FTM counter synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Software trigger can only be used by MOD and CnV synchronization, and hardware triggers can only be used by OUTMASK and FTM counter synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Fault control is disabled for all channels

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Fault control is enabled for even channels only (channels 0, 2, 4, and 6), and the selected mode is the manual fault clearing

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Fault control is enabled for all channels, and the selected mode is the manual fault clearing

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Fault control is enabled for all channels, and the selected mode is the automatic fault clearing

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The minimum loading point is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The minimum loading point is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The maximum loading point is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The maximum loading point is enabled

field.name: REINIT
field.description: FTM Counter Reinitialization by Synchronization (FTM Counter Synchronization)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM counter continues to count normally

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM counter is updated with its initial value when the selected trigger is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: OUTMASK register is updated with the value of its buffer in all rising edges of the system clock

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: OUTMASK register is updated with the value of its buffer only by the PWM synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Masked\tChannel output is forced to its inactive state

field.name: DECAPEN
field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable for Channels %s

field.name: DECAP
field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures for Channel %s

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The generation of initialization trigger is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The generation of initialization trigger is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The logic OR of the enabled fault inputs is 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The logic OR of the enabled fault inputs is 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Write protection is disabled. Write protected bits can be written

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write protection is enabled. Write protected bits cannot be written

field.name: TOFDIR
field.description: Timer Overflow Direction in Quadrature Decoder Mode\n Indicates if the TOF bit was set on the top or the bottom of counting

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Bottom of counting\tThere was an FTM counter decrement and FTM counter changes from its minimum value (CNTIN register) to its maximum value (MOD register)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Top of counting\tThere was an FTM counter increment and FTM counter changes from its maximum value (MOD register) to its minimum value (CNTIN register)

field.name: QUADIR
field.description: FTM Counter Direction in Quadrature Decoder Mode\n Indicates the counting direction and it is updated according to selected encoding mode

field.name: QUADMODE
field.description: Quadrature Decoder Mode\n Selects the encoding mode used in the quadrature decoder mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal polarity\tPhase B input signal is not inverted before identifying the rising and falling edges of this signal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Inverted polarity\tPhase B input signal is inverted before identifying the rising and falling edges of this signal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal polarity\tPhase A input signal is not inverted before identifying the rising and falling edges of this signal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Inverted polarity\tPhase A input signal is inverted before identifying the rising and falling edges of this signal

field.name: PHBFLTREN
field.description: Phase B Input Filter Enable\n Enables the filter for the quadrature decoder phase B input

field.name: PHAFLTREN
field.description: Phase A Input Filter Enable\n Enables the filter for the quadrature decoder phase A input
